attributes.action: HM Goverment should not waste £900,000 respraying the Prime Minister's plane
attributes.additional_details: The government should not even contemplate wasting almost £1 million repainting a plane.  The money would be better spent on worthy causes and not a vanity project for Boris Johnson.
attributes.background: The government should immediately stop wasting time and money on this vanity project. They should concentrate on dealing with the real problems facing the UK.  This includes the handling of the pandemic and woeful death rate which has happened on their watch, due to their mishandling.

rejection.details: By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.
